exerciseActions.resumeExerciseError: Error trying to resume the exercise
exerciseActions.practiceModeTooltip: The practice mode allows you to keep working on the exercise after the submission due date and keep practicing. This will not affect your grading! It will setup a separate repository for you that you need to clone separately.
exerciseActions.cloneRatedRepository: Clone your rated repository for this exercise:
exerciseActions.clonePracticeRepository: Clone your practice repository for this exercise:
exerciseActions.cloneExerciseRepository: Clone a repository for this exercise
exerciseActions.sourceTreeDescription: Atlassian SourceTree is a free Git client for Windows or Mac.
exerciseActions.sshKeyTip: To use ssh, you need to add an ssh-key to your account {link:here}.
